pkgmetadata.longdescription: Person-Centered Analysis // Provides an easy-to-use yet adaptable set of tools to conduct person-center analysis using a two-step clustering procedure. As described in Bergman and El-Khouri (1999) DOI:10.1002/(SICI)1521-4036(199910)41:6%3C753::AID- BIMJ753%3E3.0.CO;2-K, hierarchical clustering is performed to determine the initial partition for the subsequent k-means clustering procedure.
